alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:54PM EST until February 26 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From Friday evening to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by Friday evening and continue to a crest of 20.6 feet by Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued BY 11 AM Friday.
